comment.author: 21001715@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Sitting portraits, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: That's Abigail Adams Hancock, who married banker James Cunningham Bishop in 1891.   They had four daughters and a son.  Their 1913 divorce was covered by the New York Times.
